name: Super Piracy Quest
summary:
Long ago, an unknown figure took control of THE CAVE OF HYPE and put an end to PIRACY. Embark on a journey with our protagonist and deuteragonist, Pikachu and Dr. Andonuts respectively to save PIRACY, but more importantly to find one of the greatest artifacts THE CAVE OF HYPE has to offer...THE BAG. Throughout this journey they will meet very few helpful people, and many cows!

Download link: https://rpgmaker.net/games/13022/
